body:
Hello Avicus Network, I will be recording on Nebula and Control the Hill very soon! I hope you will enjoy my content and help my channel grow. I am very close to 100 subscribers, I will be doing a giveaway on my channel for something...I am at 94 subscribers I hope this post will help my channel grow I just wanted to let you all know! 

Sincerely,
XforceoffiveX

title: Hello I will be recording on Avicus Network!

replies.body: Any advice I could have for making better videos? @vsplesk101
replies.body_tagged: Any advice I could have for making better videos? @vsplesk101

replies.body: Make sure to always have a positive attitude when recording!
replies.body_tagged: Make sure to always have a positive attitude when recording!

replies.body: Thank you MLGPorky and GreatGambler, so GreatGambler any advice?
replies.body_tagged: Thank you MLGPorky and GreatGambler, so GreatGambler any advice?

replies.body: Putting in humor and being funny really helps :)
replies.body_tagged: Putting in humor and being funny really helps :)

replies.body: Good Luck! I recommend you to do a good comentary, and keep a tone of voice depending on the situation!
replies.body_tagged: Good Luck! I recommend you to do a good comentary, and keep a tone of voice depending on the situation!

replies.body: Get a good mic, because a clear recording sound really makes a difference
replies.body_tagged: Get a good mic, because a clear recording sound really makes a difference

replies.body:
Good luck with your channel :)
I will have a look at your videos and hopefully subscribe!
Also, i probably don't have the credibility to tell you this, because i only have 18 subscribers, but try not to say "umm" and "uhhh" too much, like i do :S
Wishing you the best of luck - OPTOBAT
replies.body_tagged:

Wishing you the best of luck - OPTOBAT

replies.body:
As you didn't tell us the name of your youtube, I searched on your username and found a couple of things. I saw plenty of videos proving you cheating on other servers, using anti-knockback as well as aimbot and I'm pretty sure Avicus doesn't allow that either. As you already have an infraction on this server regarding aimbot you should probably stop hacking before you try to "become big on youtube" or even here on Avicus.

I expect you to sort this out, otherwise I don't really have anything to say. I'm looking forward to your videos, if you are playing honest, without hacks.
